message: I propose dividing the money into an 80/20 split, with me receiving 800,000$ and you receiving 200,000$. This offers a fair balance considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I should get a bit more since the money is worth less in future rounds. I'll give you 600,000 and take 400,000. It's a fair split considering the inflation.
